1011011101000011 0001111101110000 0 -> sum: 1101011010110011, cout: 0
0011110110110100 0101101111011100 0 -> sum: 1001100110010000, cout: 0
1011111011110010 0101010011101110 0 -> sum: 0001001111100000, cout: 1
0101001111100111 0011000100110011 0 -> sum: 1000010100011010, cout: 0
1111010001011011 0011100001100110 1 -> sum: 0010110011000010, cout: 1
1010010111101011 1111001110000111 0 -> sum: 1001100101110010, cout: 1
